item.description:
We last visited Spazio in Braintree in December of 2008. Hard to believe it's been that long, because Spazio is both near at hand for the majority of our members, and a dependable performer; known for a well-executed menu of Italian favorites, some presented classically, others offered with contemporary flourishes.

We've decided to remedy the situation next Thursday, April 18th, and we hope that you'll join us at a local favorite Italian restaurant where there is definitely more than pasta on the menu.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Spazio Restaurant & Bar
Thursday, April 18th, 2013 @ 7:00 PM 
200 Quincy Ave. 
Braintree, MA
(781) 849-1577
Website: Spazio

Organizer: Mike

Min/Max: None at this time.

Guests: Yes. Up to two per member.

Price Range: The online menu shows most entrees hovering around $20.00, with a few higher, and also a few available as smaller portions for lower prices.

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over six years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

Event Fee: No Event Fee for current Annual Members. Other Members and Guests: $2.00

RSVP Deadline: Wednesday, April 17th at t:00 PM.

No-Show Policy on Membership Information Page: (Please click on the following link to be taken directly to the page.)

http://www.meetup.com/ssdomg/pages/Membership_Information/
item.how_to_find_us: Our table is reserved under both 'Mike' and 'South Shore Meetup Group'.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Spazio: The Return
